posts.post_content:
She isn't that ugly, guys... Looks a bit like Meryl Streep?
  
   
At least she has reasonably decent stats for the casting cost. She could have been 1/2 for all we know, judging from this set...
  
   
Anyway, unless Avatars perform parthenogenesis, they must have had a daddy... And unless Autumn Willow carried out multiplets, daddy must have been at her service multiple times...
  
   
I'm still claiming it was [Eron the Relentless](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Eron the Relentless)... His name gets a whole new meaning now, ey?? :P
